page.title: 08NEWTON RIGG COLLEGE PENRITH
page.content: This College runs two farms-a 228 hectare lowland farm at Newton Rigg,and Beckside.Both College farms are managed to demonstrate sound commercial practice and provide facilities for student instruction.Established woodland and recently planted areas are a feature of the hill farm.At Newton Rigg accomodation is provided for 120 students,with about 50 students living in private lodgings in the neighbourhood of the College.A list of approved lodgings is maintained which includes some suitable for married couples.The size of the College means that each student can readily feel part of a community,enabling close working relationships to be developed between students and staff.The major objective of the College is the personal development of the student.
